group_1.textCenter: (Magical Girls... Witches...@Last night's show, Nightlife Homeroom...)
(Based on what I heard by the end of classes today,@I managed to catch glimpses of a few things...)
(Although it's all still in the realm of urban legend,@the power of the media is immense.)

group_1.textRight: Oh, good job, Miura!
Thanks for the interview the other day.

group_1.textLeft: No problem.
But really, all I did was discover it. There wasn't@anything particularly interesting or juicy to share...

group_1.textRight: I'll edit that part a teeny-tiny bit,@so don't you worry.

group_1.textLeft: Wouldn't that be fabrication...
Hm, could that stack of papers be where you're@planning to create your article?

group_1.textRight: Oh yes, 'cause the ones that are displayed on the@wall are not printed, but handwritten.
It's a crazy amount of work!
Kuroda is working on bringing in the rest of@the pile of papers, I think.
Whoa, Miura!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you for your hard work.

group_1.textRight: This is exactly the kind of heavy lifting@where I come in.
Hey, can you give me a minute after I put this@stuff down?

group_1.textLeft: Me?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, well, there's just a bit of something@I wanted to talk to you about...

group_1.textLeft: Oh my god, Kuroda, could it be that you and@Miura—?!

group_1.textRight: What are you thinking? 'Course not!

group_1.textLeft: So, what is it?
(Haitani said something strange, and it's making@me feel oddly nervous...)

group_1.textRight: Actually, Miura, I've got a favor to ask you.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, once again, what is it...?

group_1.textRight: Actually, I'm planning to confess my feelings on@the day of the Festival!

group_1.textLeft: Confess your feelings...

group_1.textRight: Ohh, I mean, to Haitani...

group_1.textLeft: Oh! Ahh, is that so?

group_1.textRight: What the heck's with that reaction...

group_1.textLeft: Well, there's nothing I can help you with to@begin with, even if you ask me.

group_1.textRight: There is!

group_1.textLeft: Ehh...?
Even if I don't bring her along, the two of you@are usually together.
And besides, I'm generally rather awkward.

group_1.textRight: But, you're a Magical Girl, right...?

group_1.textLeft: Ah...you actually believed that?!

group_1.textRight: What, it's a lie?

group_1.textLeft: No, no, it's all true!
It's more like, I'm relieved and surprised to learn@that you believed me...

group_1.textRight: So, if it's all true, support me when I confess my@feelings to her.

group_1.textLeft: Huh...[chara:103401:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:103401:cheek_0][chara:103401:face_mtn_ex_030.exp3.json][chara:103401:motion_400][chara:103401:lipSynch_1] What?

group_1.textRight: I mean, if a Witch interferes with my confession,@keep it away from me!

group_1.textLeft: I-I see... I get what you mean.
(Though Witches wield curses, would they really@bother with such a trivial―)
(Wait, it's rude towards Kuroda to think that...)

group_1.textRight: Please take care of it!

group_1.textLeft: Well, I don't particularly mind, but...
Don't blame me if you get rejected...

group_1.textRight: That's a given. So you'll protect us?

group_1.textLeft: As a friend asks.

group_1.textRight: Thanks, Miura, I owe you!

group_1.textCenter: (I've made a strange promise... I feel a bit uneasy...)

group_1.narration: Kyubey is pursuing Urara Yume.@Also, there's a risk of potential Witches in the area,@so I'm going ahead to chase after them.
If you're nearby, Miura and Kurusu,@please come to the vicinity of the location@I've provided.
Perhaps you can track the magical response there@to find my location.
